definition: relating to or resembling a nipple, process of the temporal bone behind the ear at the base of the skull
details:
adjective
- relating to or resembling a nipple
= synonyms: mastoidal
- of or relating to or in the region of the mastoid process
noun
- process of the temporal bone behind the ear at the base of the skull
= synonyms: mastoidal, mastoid process, mastoid bone
